code: import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{SIGN_IN}from"../store/actionTypes";export function useUser(){var User=useSelector(function(store){return store.User;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var signIn=function signIn(data){dispatch({type:SIGN_IN,payload:{isLogged:true,data:data}});};var signOut=function signOut(){return dispatch({type:SIGN_IN,payload:{isLogged:false,data:{}}});};return{User:User,signIn:signIn,signOut:signOut};}
